catalyzed_reaction: Reversible dehalogenation of vicinal haloalcohols to epoxides; in reverse, SN2 ring-opening of cyclohexene oxide with NaOCN to form trans-hexahydro-2(3H)-benzoxazolone (trans-HBC).
formulation: Whole cell biocatalyst (wet cell); also tested as cell lysate (lysozyme-treated, soluble fraction).
name: Halohydrin dehalogenase G (HheG) from Ilumatobacter coccineus
